price: Kuma Ubangijinka Mai gãfara ne, Ma'abũcin rahama. Dã Yanã kãma su sabõda abin da suka sanã'anta, lalle ne, dã Ya gaggauta azãba a gare su. Ã'a, sunã da lõkacin alkawari, (wanda) bã zã su sãmi wata makõma ba, baicinSa.*
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ذُو ٱلرَّحۡمَةِۖ لَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُهُم بِمَا كَسَبُواْ لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ بَل لَّهُم مَّوۡعِدٞ لَّن يَجِدُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَوۡئِلٗا
footnotes: * Watau ba su da wata makõma su bar wannan lõkacin alkawarin saukar azãbar.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka al-ghafūru dhū al-raḥmati law yuākhidhuhum bimā kasabū laʿajjala lahumu al-ʿadhāba bal lahum mawʿidun lan yajidū min dūnihi mawilan
